name: Flux
description: The FLUX Protocol, a groundbreaking platform that redefines the auction experience by integrating buy pressure into every transaction. With this revolutionary approach, the FLUX team has forever transformed how auctions operate, setting a new standard for the TitanX ecosystem and beyond. Using liquid TitanX, you can participate in daily auctions which will automatically buy FLUX on the market within the same transaction. This dual-action process not only will maximise efficiency but also strengthens market demand, FLUX is an ROI arb monster. Fully decentralized and immutable, the FLUX Protocol ensures trustless secure code and transparency throughout, making it a powerful tool in the evolving world of the TitanX ecosystem, FLUX is the FLYWHEEL TitanX is looking for.
